survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Fitness Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees about their satisfaction and suggestions for improving on-site fitness facilities.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the on-site fitness facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you use the on-site fitness facilities?

questions.question_text: Which types of equipment or facilities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if answer to Q1 is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which types of equipment or facilities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if answer to Q1 is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: Please rate your overall satisfaction with the on-site fitness facilities.
questions.routing_logic: Appears if answer to Q1 is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: Please rate your overall satisfaction with the on-site fitness facilities.
script.routing_logic: Appears if answer to Q1 is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site fitness facilities?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if answer to Q1 is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site fitness facilities?
script.routing_logic: Appears if answer to Q1 is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: If you do not use the on-site fitness facilities, what are the reasons? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if answer to Q1 is 'Rarely' or 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to identify barriers to usage.

script.question_text: If you do not use the on-site fitness facilities, what are the reasons? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if answer to Q1 is 'Rarely' or 'Never'

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in additional wellness programs (e.g., nutrition workshops, mental health sessions)?
